title: This client always freezes
body:
Hey i feel like around every 5 games the client will freeze up during champ select and i cant do anything about it, let me be clear the client freezes not my computer. I often get que bans because i couldnt pick my champion, its annoying as all hell waiting for an hour for something you had no control over, any way of fixing this?

                           -S

replies.body: Most of the time those freezes in champion select will happen if your connection to the servers gets interrupted. The client needs to keep a steady connection in those lobbies otherwise it's unable to communicate with the other players. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and go through each step testing it in a custom game. Let me know if that's not helping at all though.
